author: Special Correspondent
text:
Confederation of Indian Industry, Erode Zone, has teamed up with Erode District Small Industries Association (EEDISSIA) and Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, Government of India, to organise a conference on ‘Strategising for Business Excellence’ at Hotel Club Melange on January 30.

The objective of the fourth MSME Meet 2016 is to understand the risk involved in SME business, ways to improve business through digital marketing, understanding strategies involved in branding to sustain the business, and building effective competitiveness through Blue Ocean Strategies that emphasise on Lean approach, cost reduction and quality for building competitiveness. District Collector S. Prabakar will inaugurate the conference in the presence of C. Muthusami, president, Tamil Nadu Small and Tiny Industries Association.

The speakers include P. Chinnaraj, managing director, PCR Consultants Pvt Ltd.; Srinivasan, CEO and principal consultant, Strategion Brand Consulting Corporation; Kabaly P. Subramanian, CEO, Rakansas Consulting Pvt Ltd.; S.S. Yuvaraj, managing director, SS Fabrics Mills, S.R. Sankar, senior consultant, RG Management Consultants; Sathish Kumar, partner, SGS Mediasoft, India; and R. Boopathi, vice-president, marketing, CRI Pumps Pvt. Ltd. For registrations, contact 0424-2219060 / 9003633779 / 9003748711.
title: CII conference on January 30
